scripts.es: babel src --out-dir es/src; babel node_modules/@0xcda7a --out-dir es/node_modules/@0xcda7a; babel node_modules/@polymer --out-dir es/node_modules/@polymer; babel node_modules/@webcomponents --out-dir es/node_modules/@webcomponents; babel node_modules/lit-html --out-dir es/node_modules/lit-html; babel node_modules/redux-helpers --out-dir es/node_modules/redux-helpers; babel node_modules/redux-thunk --out-dir es/node_modules/redux-thunk; babel node_modules/reselect --out-dir es/node_modules/reselect
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run es && npm run bundle && npm run minify && npm run copy-polyfills
